title: Higher $q$-Continued Fractions
authors:
Amanda Burcroff, Nicholas Ovenhouse, Ralf Schiffler, Sylvester W.
  Zhang
abstract:
We introduce a $q$-analog of the higher continued fractions introduced by the
last three authors in a previous work (together with Gregg Musiker), which are
simultaneously a generalization of the $q$-rational numbers of Morier-Genoud
and Ovsienko. They are defined as ratios of generating functions for
$P$-partitions on certain posets. We give matrix formulas for computing them,
which generalize previous results in the $q=1$ case. We also show that certain
properties enjoyed by the $q$-rationals are also satisfied by our higher
versions.
